<!-- You may use this file to transfer that content from one site to another. -->
<!-- This file is not intended to serve as a complete backup of your site. -->

<!-- To import this information into a WordPress site follow these steps: -->
<!-- 1. Log in to that site as an administrator. -->
<!-- 2. Go to Tools: Import in the WordPress admin panel. -->
<!-- 3. Install the "WordPress" importer from the list. -->
<!-- 4. Activate & Run Importer. -->
<!-- 5. Upload this file using the form provided on that page. -->
<!-- 6. You will first be asked to map the authors in this export file to users -->
<!--    on the site. For each author, you may choose to map to an -->
<!--    existing user on the site or to create a new user. -->
<!-- 7. WordPress will then import each of the posts, pages, comments, categories, etc. -->
<!--    contained in this file into your site. -->

Regardless, Karma Bavaria – set amid the lofty peaks and mountain-fed greenery of Bavaria, is offering you the chance to play on 'til the 19<sup>th</sup> with our Alpine Golf Experience!</p>
<p class="p1">For only 328€ per night for up to 2 people, you can play Tegernsee's stunning “<span class="s1">Bad Wiessee e.V” Golf Club. </span></p>]]></wp:meta_value>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The town of Schliersee is the perfect place to spend some intimate time with that special someone. Whether it’s taking a stroll around the majestic Lake Schliersee, or enjoying a couples massage at Karma Spa. 

Book now and for only 120 Euros per night you’ll receive one of our stylish superior double rooms, along with:
Easter breakfast or brunch buffet* including a glass of Prosecco.
Complimentary use of the health club featuring sauna, jacuzzi and heated swimming pool.
Complimentary Wi-Fi.]]></wp:meta_value>

Complimentary use of skittles alley, games room, and kids playroom.
Access to Karma Bavaria’s modern health club, including our stunning heated swimming pool.
Complimentary Wi-Fi.]]></wp:meta_value>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<p class="p1">There’s only a couple of weeks to go before Easter but never fear - Karma Bavaria has the perfect Easter escape for you!</p>
<p class="p1">Welcome to the misty mountains and stunning vistas of fairy tale Bavaria, where the first taste of spring is on the breeze and Karma Bavaria is ready to welcome you in cosy luxury.</p>
<p class="p1">When you’re not exploring the hiking trails and natural wonders of the Bavarian mountains, or sampling artisan foods in the beautiful Bavarian town of Schliersee, let us take care of you with our world-class facilities, contemporary dining and a fabulous wine list from the best regions on earth.</p>
<h4 class="p1"> </h4>]]></wp:meta_value>

Book now and receive our most popular family rooms from only 190 Euros per night, along with a wealth of extras!

Easter breakfast or brunch buffet* including a glass of Prosecco for Mum & Dad and an Easter egg each for the kids!

Complimentary use of skittles alley, games room, and kids playroom.

Access to Karma Bavaria’s modern health club, including our stunning heated swimming pool.

Complimentary Wi-Fi.

FOR COUPLES

Book now and for only 120 Euros per night you’ll receive one of our stylish superior double rooms, along with:

Easter breakfast or brunch buffet* including a glass of Prosecco.

Complimentary use of the health club featuring sauna, jacuzzi and heated swimming pool.

Complimentary Wi-Fi.]]></wp:meta_value>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[body]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<p class="p1">Welcome to the stunning Isles of Scilly, just off the coast of Cornwall and the UK's very own Gulf Stream playground. For lovers and newlyweds, the Scillys offer an unadulterated experience in laid-back intimacy.</p>
<p class="p1">Whether it's the winding paths and boutique produce of St Martin's, the azure inter-island waters, the rolling green hills just begging to be explored, or the wealth of fresh caught seafood, you'll find that you don't have to go abroad to get your post wedding dose of romance, relaxation and rejuvenation.</p>
<h4 class="p1"><b>Karma St Martin's </b></h4>
<p class="p1">Ideally situated overlooking its own private quay, Karma St Martin's is the epitome of relaxed island luxury and charm. Built in local stone, Karma St Martin's offers classic English style, sumptuous interiors, contemporary dining and excellent amenities.</p>
<p class="p1">Right now, you can experience Karma St Martin's as part of our Mini-moon Package. Stay three nights in a gorgeous Ocean View room from only <span class="s1">£220 per night based on two people sharing, plus a wealth of extras on us.</span></p>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_body]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e711c02fe43]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inclusions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[A bottle of champagne on arrival
Breakfast daily
2 x 30 minute massage of your choice
1 x Candlelit Lobster or Seafood dinner at Cloudesley Shovell Restaurant
Karma Romance Gift Pack
Complimentary Wi-Fi access
Honeymoon suite upgrade is available subject to availability and at additional cost]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_inclusions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e711df2fe44]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[terms_and_conditions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[£220 per night based on two people sharing. For stays in July & August a £99 a night supplement charge will be applied.
3 day minimum stay, couple must present a copy of their marriage certificate upon reservation. The package is only applicable for couples staying within 3 months of their wedding day date.

What is NOT included in the price:
Travel to and from the hotel
Any extra tour activities e.g. seal snorkelling, water sports, guided walks of St. Martin’s etc.
]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_terms_and_conditions]]></wp:meta_key>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_supporting_images]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e2ff486d47d]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[heading]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[The Isles of Scilly come alive for the 2017 World Pilot Gig Championships]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_heading]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e711812fe42]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[body]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<p>Join us for the Isles of Scilly’s biggest weekend of the year - the 2017 World Pilot Gig Championships - taking place on Friday, 28th April through to Monday, 1st May </p>
<h4>A Race Steeped in History</h4>
<p>Now in its 28th year, the event honours the long tradition of the Isles’ pilots – who guided ships through the treacherous waters off the Isles of Scilly and Cornish coast. Competition to win the job was fierce; the Pilot Gigs, which consisted of six rowers and a coxswain, would race out to the ships, and the first pilot to reach the ship would win the contract.   </p>
<h4>Karma’s Luxury Scilly Isles Hotel – Karma St. Martin’s</h4>
<p>Where better to take in all the excitement of this amazing nautical event than from Karma’s own luxury Isles of Scilly hotel, Karma St. Martin’s. From its perch on a slope just above the quay, the resort offers outstanding views of the Isles of Scilly's clear Gulf Stream waters, but there are a few other things that make Karma St. Martin’s truly special: our ‘never too much trouble’ hospitality, our comfy bar with its leather couches and open atmosphere, our curated Cornish library and, perhaps most importantly, dining on the fresh-caught spoils of the sea in our signature restaurant.   Book now with Karma St. Martin’s and you’ll get one of our stunning ocean view rooms, including daily breakfast, for only £180 per night!</p>]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_body]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e711c02fe43]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[inclusions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Complimentary breakfast, Accommodation in an Ocean View Rooms]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_inclusions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e711df2fe44]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[terms_and_conditions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[For stays between 20th April - 1st May 2017]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_terms_and_conditions]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_58e7128c2fe45]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[address]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[Isles of Scilly, Lower Town, St.Martin’s, TR25 0QW, England
 T : +44 (0)3 333 232 353 (toll free) 
Email :st.martins@karmaresorts.com]]></wp:meta_value>

The luxurious Karma St. Martin’s offers outstanding views of St Martin's Gulf Stream waters, but there are a few other things that make Karma St Martin's truly special: our ‘never too much trouble’ hospitality, our comfy bar with its leather couches and open atmosphere, our curated Cornish library and, perhaps most importantly, dining on the fresh­caught seafood in our signature restaurant.Explore the stunning Isles of Scilly, staying at Karma St. Martin’s for only £120 per night.]]></wp:meta_value>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[<p class="p1">What's better than taking a friend on an alpine golf adventure? Spending even more time playing golf of course!</p>
<p class="p1">Like our Alpine Golf Experience, our Plus package includes a wealth of value for experienced – or just plain enthusiastic – golfers.</p>
<p class="p1">For only 408€ per night for up to 2 people, you can play Tegernsee's stunning “<span class="s1">Bad Wiessee e.V” Golf Club for t</span><span class="s2">wo</span><span class="s1"> days, as well as receive well-earned and sumptuous daily dinners, breakfasts, green fees and return transfers between Karma Bavaria and the course on us! </span></p>]]></wp:meta_value>
